channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report E-2024030468
item.description:
Report E-2024030468

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-08
  • City: TUPELO
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report X-2024030963
item.description:
Report X-2024030963

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-26T15:10:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-18
  • City: BELDEN
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package handler noticed a powder substance leaking form bottom of container at 730am DescribePack: plastic pail is cracked at bottom and leaking DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: proper hazmat team removed package from work area to isolate in hazmat holding area. proper clean up was used
